scripts.dev:web: cd web && npm ci && npm run dev -- --port 5173
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm ci && npm run build && cd .. && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force web-dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path web-dist | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force web/dist/* web-dist/"
